headline: Birmingham City Women sign Tegan McGowan from Charlton
summary: Tegan McGowan completes a transfer from Charlton Athletic to Birmingham City, the Welsh youth international signing a two-year deal. McGowan spent two years with the Addicks, making 25 appearances and scoring five goals, while internationally […]

headline: Manchester United Women sign Dutch international Dominique Janssen
summary: Manchester United have made former Arsenal defender Dominique Janssen their first summer signing on a three-year contract, with an option for a further year. She won the WSL title, Conti Cup twice and FA Cup […]

headline: UEFA Women’s EURO 2025: behind the scenes with tournament coordinator Doris Keller
summary: Exactly a year from today, UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 will get underway. Our brand-new Issue 85 (order yours here!) includes a five-page feature on Switzerland’s preparation for next summer’s showpiece event. Here is an accompanying interview […]

headline: Liverpool Women sign Canadian international Olivia Smith
summary: Liverpool have signed 19-year-old Canada international midfielder/attacker Olivia Smith from Sporting Lisbon. Smith’s first season as a professional in Portugal saw her named Best Young Player of the Campeonato Nacional Feminino. She produced 13 goals […]

headline: Arsenal Women seal deal for Barcelona’s Mariona Caldentey
summary: Arsenal have secured the signing of Mariona Caldentey from Barcelona, with whom she won 25 trophies in a ten-year-spell. The 28-year-old scored 114 goals in 302 appearances for Barca, while for Spain she has netted […]

headline: Portsmouth Women arrange seven pre-season friendlies
summary: Ahead of their debut in the Barclays Women’s Championship, Portsmouth’s pre-season opponents include Arsenal and Chelsea’s U-21 sides. Beginning away at FAWNL Southern Premier Division Cheltenham Town on Sunday 28 July, Pompey go to WSL […]

headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]

headline: Women’s & girls’ open training / trials – Summer 2024
summary: Here is our summer 2024 free listing for clubs recruiting players for their women’s or girls’ teams, as well as voluntary staff. Beds & Herts Apsley – Recruiting players for girls teams and also women’s […]

headline: Birmingham City Women sign Northern Ireland international Rebecca McKenna
summary: Birmingham City have signed 23-year-old Northern Ireland international Rebecca McKenna on a two-year deal from Championship rivals Charlton Athletic. McKenna has 43 caps for her country and featured in all Charlton’s 22 league matches last […]

headline: Filippa Angeldahl joins Real Madrid after exit from Man City Women
summary: Sweden international midfielder Filippa Angeldahl has signed for Real Madrid following her departure from Manchester City. The 26-year-old played 44 times over three seasons for Manchester City, with whom she won the Continental Tyres League […]
